name: Rum and Water
longDesc: You are in a barrel room full of unlabelled barrels.  The bottle has a message on the inside bottom but you cannot read it due to the cloudy nature of the bottles contents.  You can see two exits, labelled North and East
shortDesc: You have access to a bottle that has a message on the inside bottom but you cannot read it due to the cloudy nature of the bottles contents.  There are two exits, labelled North and East.
feat1desc: bottle that has a message on the inside bottom but you cannot read it due to the cloudy nature of the bottles contents
feat1interactSuccess: You've revealed the message 'GO NORTH TO A ROOM YOU HAVE NOT ENCOUNTERED YET'
feat1interactComplete: there is an emply bottle with message exposed
feat1interactFail: the bottle is still full and the message unreadable
